data.name: Orlando the Fireman
data.detailed_description:
You may also like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1213860/Cut_Smash_Wrap/


About the Game

Orlando the Fireman is a really simple game where you play as the title character trying to save as many lives you can from burning buildings.





Be the multitask hero saving many victims from 2 buildings at the same time while dodging big flames. Orlando will be continuously raised by the ladder between the buildings and you must click anywhere on the screen to switch the building he is facing. Choose the windows with the victims and avoid the burning ones until the water is ready.





Do your best until your colleague Bernardo prepare the water hose. Smash the water button to maximize the rescues and put out the fire. On watering mode the ladder speed raises and Orlando can face any window and score with it all.



The game art style is heavily inspired by our favorite video game hero from the 80s. A modern homage with a twist.

data.short_description: Orlando the Fireman is a really simple game where you play as the title character trying to save as many lives you can from burning buildings. A game about real-world heroes with a style inspired by our favorite 80s character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
